homepage-subtitle: I build things for the web.
homepage-paragraph: I’m a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) web experiences.
about-paragraph-1: Hello! My name is Alessio and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development began in 2020, when I developed a website traffic management portal for a university exam — turns out that creating a custom website taught me a lot about HTML and CSS and made me discover this passion!
about-paragraph-2: Fast-forward to today, I have the privilege of working at an
about-paragraph-3: and my main focus is building accessible and inclusive digital products and experiences.
about-paragraph-4: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:
company-ItalianGres-1: Developed and maintained new features for the website, both front-office and back-office, using Prestashop CMR and PHP
company-ItalianGres-2: Improved site performance and SEO indexing through the introduction of best practices and fixes
company-ItalianGres-3: Developed off-site scripts for managing internal company processes using primarily Python
company-expert.ai-1: Developed extension for IntelliJ about code coloring for particular file extensions used by the company
company-expert.ai-2: New features developed for proprietary artificial intelligence called Cogito
company-expert.ai-3: The features were developed using Java
project-description-got-random-quotes: Graphic implementation of API that allows the generation of quotes belong to the famous TV series Game of Thrones
project-description-drum-machine: Implementation of a drum machine as an exercise to learn how React works
project-description-common-js-calculator: Simple implementation of a calculator as an exercise to learn how React works
project-description-web-portfolio-v2: Second version of my web portfolio, implemented by rebuilding from scratch the version created by Brittany Chiang
contact-message: Although I’m not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open.Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll try my best to get back to you!
